creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Adam seated at L below tree; Eve at R reaching up to receive a piece of fruit from a snake in a tree; with her opposite hand, Eve is handing another fruit to Adam; animals resting in background behind Eve
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription, Marks, Label

Plat monogram and date in plate, upper left: [1541 / AG
provenance: Franz von Hagens (1817-1899), sale 1927; Albert W. Blum (until February 27, 1988; his sale, Sotheby's, New York, no. 1168; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: The Fall of Mankind
